sentences.english: Chin Shihhuang, also named Yingzheng , is the founder of the Qin dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 秦始皇，姓赢名政，是秦朝的开国皇帝。

sentences.english: Jiang Kai countries after the surgery, bought a ticket to go home immediately.
sentences.chinese: 江开国在手术以后，自己买了车票要立即回家。

sentences.english: It is an interpretation of executive power that would make the Founders whirl in their graves.
sentences.chinese: 这一关于行政权力的解释会让开国先贤们死不瞑目。

sentences.english: I was there when the ceremony (of the Founding of the PRC)going.
sentences.chinese: 我能参加开国大典那真是十分荣幸。

sentences.english: Kai Guo Da Dian is a documentary.
XIAO-Yan is the first emperor of the Liang Dynasty in Wei and Jin era.
sentences.chinese: 梁武帝萧衍是魏晋南北朝时期梁朝的开国帝王。

sentences.english: If Rexroth was the founding father, Madeline Gleason was the founding mother.
sentences.chinese: 如果力士乐是开国元勋，麦德兰格里森是创始母亲。

sentences.english: It was a  creed written into the founding documents that declared the  destiny of a nation.
sentences.chinese: 它是写进开国宪章的信条，宣示了这个国家的命运。

sentences.english: Octavian became the first emperor of a new era.
sentences.chinese: 屋大维成为了一个新时代的开国皇帝。

sentences.english: Everyone is particularly concerned about the origin of Fang Qiong, Jiang Kai countries back to her to do the fish soup.
sentences.chinese: 大家都特别关心方琼的来历，江开国还给她做了鱼汤。

sentences.english: He is the first king of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 他就是以色列的开国元君。

sentences.english: Want to go to find the adopter professor shen Jiang Kai countries.
sentences.chinese: 江开国想去找收养人沈教授。

sentences.english: Mulan and Jiang Kai once again return to my grandfather home, finally found my grandpa.
sentences.chinese: 木兰和江开国再次回到爷爷老家废墟，终于找到爷爷。

sentences.english: Last of New China's first generals cremated.
sentences.chinese: 中国最后一位开国上将吕正操下葬。

sentences.english: Our founders believed in universal values.
sentences.chinese: 美国的开国元勋们相信共同价值。

sentences.english: XIAO-Yan is the first emperor of the hang Dynasty in Wei and Jin era.
sentences.chinese: 梁武帝萧衍是魏晋南北朝时期梁朝的开国帝王。
